mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartid, memberid, productid, quantity) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cartid, c.memberid, c.productid, c.quantity, p.productname, p.productprice, p.productimg FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.productid = p.productid WHERE c.memberid = #{param1}
